tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP We)) (VP (VP (VBP want) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB change) (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS lives)))))) (, ,) (CC but) (VP (VBP refuse) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB change) (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS thoughts)))))))) (, ,) (ADVP (RB therefore)) (S (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VBP remain) (ADJP (VBN bound)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [want/VBP nsubj>We/PRP xcomp>[change/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[lives/NNS nmod:poss>our/PRP$]] punct>,/, cc>but/CC conj:but>[refuse/VBP nsubj>We/PRP xcomp>[change/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[thoughts/NNS nmod:poss>our/PRP$]]] punct>,/, parataxis>[remain/VBP advmod>therefore/RB nsubj>we/PRP xcomp>bound/VBN] punct>./.]
